SELECT TYPE FROM SILVERSEARCH WHERE SILVERNAME = #{silvername}
SELECT TYPE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{userid}
SELECT USERID, TYPE, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, REGISTRATION, EMAIL, WARNING, TELEPHONE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{userid}
SELECT RE_SEQ USERID, RE_TYPE, RE_DETAILTYPE, RE_JOB, RE_CONTENT, RE_DATE, RE_AREAA, RE_AREBB, RE_QUALIFICATION FROM RESUME WHERE USERID=#{userid}

select A.SEACH_SEQ ,A.TYPE ,A.AREAA ,A.AREAB ,A.AREAC ,A.SILVERNAME ,A.SERVICE ,A.GRADE ,A.LAUITUDE ,A.LONGITUDE ,A.ORGNAME ,A.NAME ,B.DETAIL_NUMBER ,TO_CHAR(B.ESTABLISHMENT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ESTABLISHMENT ,TO_CHAR(B.APPROVAL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPROVAL ,B.address ,B.tel ,B.parkinglot
FROM SILVERSEARCH A ,DETAILS B where B.SEACH_SEQ = A.SEACH_SEQ and A.SILVERNAME = #{silvername}
